messages.message: Third Issue: Once you do run map records you still get a singular IBOCR file instead of files by the split. Is there ways to split the files up? Otherwise how would I build seperate workflows with a PDF that contained multiple types of records? (To eventually train the classifier, because classifier does not have a map records step... or does it?)
Not sure if I understand the first error
Yes, second issue, process file must run before map records
Third issue: we don't have a great way to process different types of documents. In one flow
Or different types of records rather. You'd like to have to use some UDFs to split the files and then do separate processing
MapRecords should really be an App with the ability to do just that... kinda like what Anant showed as sequencer....
Or at the very least MapRecords should have an optional flag that has it split the files
